title: Honey-Can-Do SRT-01157 Chrome Rolling Urban Triple Sorter Instruction Video
description: Instruction video for assembling your new Honey-Can-Do SRT-01157 chrome rolling urban triple sorter

asset.author: myhoneycando
asset.description: Instruction video for assembling your new Honey-Can-Do SRT-01157 chrome rolling urban triple sorter

transcripts: At Honey-Can-Do we are your source for organization, storage and style. We make product assembly easy so that well any honey can do it. To begin remove product contents and group all like parts, notice this unit is assembled using ingenious support clips which have ridges inside join together like this and have arrows on the outside pointing upward. When joined around a pole the ridges go into the grooves of the pole and the clips form a cone shape which support the corners of the shelves also notice this unit has locking and non locking casters. Locate the four support poles which has black caps on one end and small threaded holes for the casters on the other and attach a support clip by joining it around the poles bottom groove like this. Now attach a caster by screwing it into the threaded hole on the bottom of the pole and tightening it with the wrench, assemble the remaining three poles using the same method. Now locate the bottom shelf and assembling the unit on its side, thread the poles through each corner of the shelf like this making sure the locking casters go on the same side of the cart. Next place the unit upright and seat the shelf securely now join four support clips on the first or second top groove of the support poles for the laundry bag frame lower the bag frame into place and seat it securely. Then locate the three laundry bags and thread each bag with two laundry bag hangers like this. Finally lower the bags into place time for the laundry voila your chrome rolling urban triple sorter is ready for laundry sorting action, dirty clothes never looked so good happy organizing. At honey-can-do we don't believe you have to go broke to have a beautiful well-organized home and assembly should be easy to do.
